services.title: Lawn mowing and shaping
services.description: We maintain the lawn at a customer-chosen height, ensuring it looks even, fresh, and well-shaped throughout the season.

services.title: Shrub and hedge trimming
services.description: We keep hedges and shrubs in the desired shape and height, promoting density and healthy growth.

services.title: Lawn aeration
services.description: We improve soil structure by perforating small holes, allowing better absorption of water, air, and nutrients.

services.title: Tree pruning
services.description: We perform seasonal sanitary and shaping pruning to maintain the health and safety of trees.

services.title: Soil and plant fertilization
services.description: We fertilize with organic and mineral nutrients suited to the season and plant needs, including foliar feeding for quick absorption.

services.title: Weeding
services.description: We regularly remove weeds to maintain a clean and tidy garden appearance.

services.title: Tree cutting and thinning
services.description: We remove dead or unwanted branches to ensure safety and healthy tree growth.

services.title: High grass mowing
services.description: We mow overgrown areas with dense vegetation â€“ ideal for cleaning neglected properties.

services.title: High grass mulching
services.description: We use mulching mowing that finely chops the grass for natural fertilization and moisture retention.

gallerySection.title: Inspiration from the Nature Around Us
gallerySection.description: Each project is unique â€“ created with care and love for nature to inspire and bring peace.

0.question: What gardening services do you offer?
0.answer: We offer complete care for your garden, including lawn mowing, trimming shrubs and trees, fertilizing, weeding, pest control, and irrigation system maintenance. Additionally, we perform investment cleaning of plots for sale, removing unwanted vegetation and debris.

1.question: What is investment cleaning of a plot?
1.answer: It is a service that prepares the plot for sale, making it more attractive to buyers. It includes the removal of shrubs, weeds, trees, and construction debris to make the property look clean, spacious, and easy to develop.

2.question: Why should I clean my plot before selling?
2.answer: A well-maintained plot increases the chances of selling at a better price. Buyers are more likely to invest in a property that looks neat and ready for use.

3.question: What subscription plans do you offer?
3.answer:
âœ” Basic â€“ Essential maintenance (mowing, watering, leaf cleaning) â€“ 1 visit per month
âœ” Standard â€“ Regular care (shrub trimming, fertilizing) â€“ 2 visits per month
âœ” Deluxe â€“ Full maintenance (pest control, decorative plant care) â€“ every 10 days
âœ” Premium â€“ Exclusive care (special plants, automated irrigation systems) â€“ every week

4.question: How do I choose the right plan?
4.answer: If you have a small yard and only need basic care, choose Basic. For regular maintenance, we recommend Standard. If you want a perfect garden at all times, Deluxe or Premium are the best options.

5.question: What does plot cleaning include?
5.answer:
âœ” Removal of unwanted vegetation (shrubs, weeds, overgrowth)
âœ” Mulching of tall grass
âœ” Tree cutting (if needed)
âœ” Waste removal

6.question: How long does plot cleaning take?
6.answer: It depends on the size and condition of the area. Smaller plots can be cleaned in 1-2 days, while overgrown areas may take longer.

7.question: How is the price for services calculated?
7.answer:
The price depends on:
â€¢ The size of the garden or plot
â€¢ The type of services (subscription maintenance or one-time cleaning)
â€¢ The level of pollution (vegetation density, presence of construction debris)
After a free inspection, we will provide you with an individual offer.

8.question: What payment methods do you accept?
8.answer: We accept bank transfers, cash, and online payments.

9.question: Are there discounts for long-term customers?
9.answer: Yes, we offer discounts for annual subscriptions and combined services.

10.question: Do I need to be present during the service?
10.answer: It is not required. After cleaning or maintenance, we send photos and a report.

11.question: How do I request a service?
11.answer: Contact us by phone or through the contact form on our website. We offer a free inspection and consultation.
